text.__SUMMARY__: Conasprella sauros is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae, the cone snails and their allies.
text.Description: The size of the shell attains 30 mm.
text.Distribution: This marine species occurs from Louisiana, USA to Campeche, Mexico
text.References: Puillandre N., Duda T.F., Meyer C., Olivera B.M. & Bouchet P. (2015). One, four or 100 genera? A new classification of the cone snails. Journal of Molluscan Studies. 81: 1-23
